ISSUE.TITLE: Attribute 'charges' of ProductFournisseurPrice (buying price) cannot be displayed as list column
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Buying prices (ProductFournisseurPrice) can optionally have the attribute 'charges' to store transportation costs and other related charges for a supplier price. The attribute is only shown, if PRODUCT_CHARGES is set. product/fournisseurs.php displays a list of vendor prices with selectable columns, but it's not possible to show a column for charges, even if the option is set correctly. ### Environment Version 17.0
